import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Card, CardBody, CardTitle, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, ModalFooter, Media, Table, NavItem, } from "reactstrap"; import classnames from "classnames"; import stateWrapper from "../../../containers/provider"; import instance from "../../../helpers/axiosly"; //Import Breadcrumb import Breadcrumbs from "../../../components/Common/Breadcrumb"; //i18n import { withNamespaces } from "react-i18next"; import AvForm from "availity-reactstrap-validation/lib/AvForm"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import RecentClient from './RecentClient'; import RecentWithdrawal from './RecentWithdrawal' const AdminDashboard = (props) => { const[projects, setProject] = useState([]) const[libraries, setLibraries] = useState([]) const[withdrawal, setWithdrawal] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { let userData = props.userStore.fetchUser(props); async function fetchData(){ try { props.userStore.fetchAllUser( userData.access_token ); const res = await props.masterStore.fetchProject( userData.access_token ); setProject(res.data.data.rows) const result = await props.masterStore.fetchLibrary( userData.access_token ); setLibraries(result.data.data.rows) const resWithdrawal = await props.masterStore.fetchWithdrawal( userData.access_token ); setWithdrawal(resWithdrawal.data.data.rows) } catch (e) { console.log(e); } } fetchData(); //eslint-disable-line }, []) let users = props.userStore.state.sessionData.allUserList; const client = users && users.filter(user => user.RoleId === 2) const writer = users && users.filter(user => user.RoleId === 3) //let projects = props.masterStore.state.sessionData.projectList; //const project = projects && projects //console.log(projects) //let librarys = props.masterStore.state.sessionData.libraryList; //const library = librarys && librarys //console.log(library) return (
{/* Render Breadcrumb */}

Client Count

{`${client ? client.length : 0}`}
View

Writer Count

{`${writer ? writer.length : 0}`}
View

Total User

{`${writer && client ? writer.length + client.length : 0}`}
View

Withdrawal Request

{``}

Project Count

{`${projects ? projects.length: 0}`}

Library Count

{`${libraries ? libraries.length : 0 }`}
); }; export default withNamespaces()(stateWrapper(AdminDashboard));
